hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT p.stopId, count(*) FROM StopProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.stopId.agencyId = :agencyId AND :timeFrom <= p.time AND p.time < :timeTo GROUP BY p.stopId.id
SELECT p.stopId, count(*) FROM StopProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.stopId.agencyId = :agencyId AND :timeFrom <= p.time AND p.time < :timeTo AND p.status = :status GROUP BY p.stopId.id
SELECT p FROM StopProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.stopId.agencyId = :agencyId AND :timeFrom <= p.time AND p.time < :timeTo
SELECT p FROM StopProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.stopId.agencyId = :agencyId AND :timeFrom <= p.time AND p.time < :timeTo AND p.status = :status
SELECT p FROM StopProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.stopId = :stopId
SELECT p FROM TripProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.tripId = :tripId
SELECT p.label FROM TripProblemReportRecord p WHERE p.label != NULL GROUP BY p.label
